content:
If you find any bookmarks with snowflake symbols in the library,
those are the ones I left in the books.
info: NPC事件模板4-修改NPC昵称-0保底_4-修改NPC昵称

content:
Do you remember the snowcone bookmarks and the nickname I told you about?
I had a sudden urge recently and started using a different kind of bookmark...
Which reminds me...
info: NPC事件模板4-修改NPC昵称-0保底_4-修改NPC昵称

content:
Because of my snowflake bookmarks,
everyone in the Academia calls me <style=Highlight>Snowcone</style>,
by the way, would you like to call me that too?
info: NPC事件模板4-修改NPC昵称-0保底_4-修改NPC昵称
NPC事件模板4-修改NPC昵称-0保底_4-修改NPC昵称

content:
So your favorite is my real name?
I see, when calling a friend,
you want to call them by their truest self...
info: NPC事件模板4-修改NPC昵称-0保底_4-修改NPC昵称
NPC事件模板4-修改NPC昵称-0保底_4-修改NPC昵称

content:
About my nickname,
are you going to keep calling me Snowcone...
or would you like to change it?
info: NPC事件模板4-修改NPC昵称-0保底_4-修改NPC昵称

content:
For some reason, this nickname makes me feel...{短暂停}
closer to you!
info: NPC事件模板4-修改NPC昵称-0保底_4-修改NPC昵称

content:
Aw, you're making me blush.
I was found in the vast snowy wilderness,
And that's how I got the name Frostia.

content: I want to call you Frostia.

content:

Simple and beautiful, just like you and me.
